rule.name: courseRecordFacets
rule.definition: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_facet"( name: "Departments", options: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_facetOption"( id: 1, name: "Chemistry", filter: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "department", operator: "=", value: "CHEM" ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_facetOption"( id: 2, name: "Classics", filter: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "department", operator: "=", value: "CLAS" ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_facetOption"( id: 3, name: "Computer Science", filter: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "department", operator: "=", value: "CMSC" ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_facetOption"( id: 4, name: "Engineering", filter: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "department", operator: "=", value: "ENGR" ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_facetOption"( id: 5, name: "History", filter: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "department", operator: "=", value: "HIST" ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_facetOption"( id: 6, name: "Mathematics", filter: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "department", operator: "=", value: "MATH" ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_facetOption"( id: 7, name: "Physics", filter: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "department", operator: "=", value: "PHYS" ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_facetOption"( id: 8, name: "Statistics", filter: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "department", operator: "=", value: "STAT" ) ) } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_facet"( name: "Professors", options: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_facetOption"( id: 9, name: "Knuth", filter: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "professor", operator: "=", value: "Knuth" ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_facetOption"( id: 10, name: "Newton", filter: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "professor", operator: "=", value: "Newton" ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_facetOption"( id: 8, name: "Schrödinger", filter: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "professor", operator: "=", value: "Schrödinger" ) ), } ) }
